title: Ep. 705 The Plot Thickens as the Dems Run Out of Options
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the tangled web of connections that enabled the Obama team to spy on the Trump team while simultaneously minimizing the paper trail of evidence of their misdeeds.
 
News Picks:
Today’s edition of liberal myth-busting: “Do Illegal Immigrants Really Pay 10B a Year in Taxes?”
 
A great piece about all of the economic good news happening. 
 
An interesting take on the rewriting of the rules to attack Trump.
 
Yes! Citizens are standing up. Read this about a citizen protest.
 
Did the UK spy apparatus spy on Trump? 
 
Did we move information from the NSA cloud to the CIA cloud to hide evidence?
 
In defense of cash. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
